sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { getArtList } from 'webapp/art/reducer/art.reducer' const SearchBar = () => { const typeRef = useRef() const keywordRef = useRef() const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleClick = e => {const param = { type: typeRef.current.value, keyword: keywordRef.current.value, page: 1 } dispatch(getArtList(param)) } return (
handleClick()} value="검색"/>
) } export default SearchBar
